_description: Pleasures worth attending to — one monorhyming quatrain in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
To þe flour springendeTo þe foul singendeTo þe
                    deu fallendeTo þe snow meltende
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 16.
